sentences.en: ...slot-machine tokens.
sentences.cn: …自动贩卖机使用的代用币。

sentences.en: " Just a token payment, " Johnny said.
sentences.cn: “ 只要象征性的一点钱算个表示, ” 约翰昵说.

sentences.en: a ring given in token of love.
sentences.cn: 一只象征爱情而给的戒指

sentences.en: A small token payment will keep the bank happy.
sentences.cn: 象征性地付点钱，银行就会满意了。

sentences.en: After normalization of attributes, you can count on every token in an attribute being separated from its neighbors by whitespace.
sentences.cn: 在属性规范化后，可以依靠的属性中的每个记号是通过空白来与其邻居区分开来。

sentences.en: Black is a token of mourning.
sentences.cn: 黑色是居丧的象征.

sentences.en: But, in very truth, she is right as regards this hateful token.
sentences.cn: 不过, 的的确确, 她对这可恨的标记的看法是没错的.

sentences.en: By the same token , the everlasting interdependence is actually an everlasting love.
sentences.cn: 正如, 永远的依存,也是永远的爱.

sentences.en: Don't forget to clip the token and stick it on your card.
sentences.cn: 别忘了剪下标志，贴到你的卡上。

sentences.en: Doth thy sentence bind thee to wear the token in thy sleep?
sentences.cn: 判决是不是规定你睡觉时也要佩着那标记?

sentences.en: Here is the fifth token towards our offer. You need six of these tokens.
sentences.cn: 这是第5张礼券，你需要6张才能享受我们的特价。

sentences.en: If you give up exercise, your muscles shrink and fat increases. By the same token, if you expend more energy you will lose fat.
sentences.cn: 停止锻炼会使肌肉萎缩、脂肪增加。同样，如果花更多的精力锻炼，就会减掉脂肪。

sentences.en: Miners have staged a two-hour token stoppage to demand better pay and conditions.
sentences.cn: 矿工们举行了两小时的象征性停工，以要求提高工资和改善工作条件。

sentences.en: Please accept this gift as a small token of our appreciation.
sentences.cn: 区区薄礼，略表谢意，还请笑纳。

sentences.en: Please accept this gift in token of our affection for you.
sentences.cn: 请接受这一礼物,这是我们微薄的情意.

sentences.en: slot-machine tokens
sentences.cn: 自动贩卖机使用的代用币

sentences.en: The announcement was welcomed as a step in the right direction, but was widely seen as a token gesture.
sentences.cn: 该公告被认为是向正确方向迈进的一步，因而受到欢迎，但也被普遍看作是一种象征性的姿态。

sentences.en: The government thinks it can get away with token gestures on environmental issues.
sentences.cn: 政府以为它在环境问题上做个样子就能敷衍过去。

sentences.en: The mystic token alighted on the hither verge of the stream.
sentences.cn: 那神秘的标志落在离小溪不远的地方.

sentences.en: there was little evidence to substantiate the gossip and, by the same token, there was little to disprove it.
sentences.cn: 没有什么证据来证实这则小道消息，同样也没有证据来反驳它。

sentences.en: This little gift is a token of our regard.
sentences.cn: 这点礼物是我们大家的一点心意.

sentences.en: We offer this small token by way of appreciation.
sentences.cn: 我们赠送这小小的礼物以表谢意.

sentences.en: You described her as the token woman on the shortlist.
sentences.cn: 你把她形容为入围名单上象征性的女性人选。

words.tran_cn: 象征的；表意的；作为对某事的保证的

phrases.phrase: by the same (或 that 或 this) token

phrases.tran_cn: 令牌传递，令牌传送；通行令牌
令牌环（一个环状的区域网路）

trans.tran_cn: 作为对某事的保证的，象征性的，作为标志的
trans.tran_en: done as a first sign that an agreement, promise etc will be kept and that more will be done later
a round piece of metal that you use instead of money in some machines
something that represents a feeling, fact, event etc
